bone_segmentation.title: Generic bone segmentation
bone_segmentation.description: This pipeline utilises a marching cube algorithm to generate a 3D model from a series of CT scans. As it performs the segmentation based on Hounsfield units, it is agnostic to the specific body site.

lung_segmentation.title: Lung segmentation
lung_segmentation.description: This pipeline segments the lungs and the airway from a series of CT scans.

abdominal_segmentation.title: Abdominal Segmentation
abdominal_segmentation.description: This pipeline uses a pre-trained dense VNET neural network to segment abdominal CT scans. The resulting model will provide a segmentation of 8 different organs in the abdominal area.

kidney_segmentation.title: kidney segmentation
kidney_segmentation.description: This pipeline uses a pre-trained Unet neural network to segment kidney scans. The resulting model will provide a segmentation of the kidney and kidney tumors.

brain_segmentation.title: brain segmentation
brain_segmentation.description: Generate 3D models of 11 different segmentations of a brain.

glb_importer.title: brain glb_importer
glb_importer.description: Imports a glb file into the viewer
